Logic Analysis: Contains SupplyChainContract class with functions to add, update, and get items, and transfer ownership. Uses OpenZeppelin for secure contract development.
Shared Knowledge: SupplyChainContract.sol will utilize OpenZeppelin contracts for secure ownership and state management, focusing on gas efficiency and clear interfaces for front-end integration.
Anything UNCLEAR: Clarification needed on the specific types of items to be managed in the supply chain and any specific user roles besides the contract owner.
